description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.classes.0tC4GBpJ0S17VR6a]{Precog}

The following represent the most common precog anchors. See page 9 for more information on the anchor class feature. If an anchor ability allows for a saving throw to resist its effects, the DC is equal to 10 + half your precog level + your Dexterity modifier.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.hxVH1ncHE1mijpY0]{Chronomancy Anchor}

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.WQDfX2Gn18w68jkI]{Dimension of Time Anchor}

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.mgH7ErVBysRDz08R]{Doomed Future Anchor}

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.vS6q2QD8zDJ3cie7]{Fragmented Past Anchor}

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.vj6TekJLeEqmBAQs]{Memory Echoes Anchor}

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.FlmHQuHt3IS4H9vQ]{The Gap Anchor}

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.0i2Cjao57vviLIyW]{Timewarped Anchor}
